body.p:
Irvine Kentucky
Nov 26th 1865
To the Gov. of Ky --
Sir
The undersigned petitioners citizens of Estill & Jackson Counties, represent that Uriah Horn was indicted in the Jackson Circuit Court for illegal gaming & plead guilty & was fined $20 dollars & cost

The amount bet was a mere trifle and Horn is a very poor man and has made a good soldier. We hope that you will remit the fine -- Horn is a Citizen of Estill county --, Send the remit to the remit to the Sheriff of Estill County --

Yours very Respectfully --
H. C. Lilly
D, B, Scholl
M B Mosely
Ansel Daniels
R W Smith
J. B Ashcraft
E Herndon
Isaac N. Cardwell
Jordan Neal

Jackson Cir Ct
vs
Uriah Horn
$20,
Gaming,
Remitted 18th Dec/65
